metadata.title: bebe Girls' Legging Sweatsuit Set - 2 Piece Super Soft Sweatshirt and Leggings (7-16)
features: OFFICIALLY LICENSED BEBE: Girls' Yummy Legging Set with a super soft sweatshirt and leggings; An attitude, not an age; A true original, always defining fashion's next stride forward

SUPER SOFT SET: Super comfortable and warm set for girls delivers excellent comfort on cold mornings and evenings; Great for all outdoor fun, this playful yummy pullover sweatsuit will let your girl enjoy the autumn and winter without worrying about the cold; A must-have in your daughter's pullover collection

VERSATILE: These legging sets come in a variety of colors to suit her unique style; Choose from grey, berry, orchid, and rose to surprise your daughter with a great-looking yummy sweatsuit that will let her stand out wherever she goes; Perfect for back to school, sports, and hanging out with friends

COMFORT FIT: The extra comfy leggings feature an elastic waistband to provide maximum comfort and not restrict her movement; These convenient yoga pants will keep her comfy and stay in place during a workout session making them great active bottoms for little and big girls

AFFORDABLE CLOTHING SET: Get your little girl a great 2-piece legging set featuring a fashionable pullover sweatsuit and matching leggings topped with an elastic waistband; Yummy active legging sets make a wonderful Christmas or birthday present; Perfect gift idea for daughters, sisters, granddaughters, nieces, cousins, and friends
description: bebe Girls' Legging Set - 2 Piece Yummy Fleece Sweatshirt and Leggings Kids Clothing Set is a great addition to your girl's wardrobe. Made of extra soft fabric for a great feel and perfect fit, this girls' legging set features extra soft pull-on leggings and a comfortable pullover. COMFORTABLE: Functional and lightweight yummy leggings for active girls, perfect also as casual loungewear. Wear these leggings together with the matching sweatshirt for a truly outstanding outfit. DURABLE MATERIAL: Whether she is off to school or hanging out with friends wearing this yummy legging set, you won’t have to worry about ripping and fading. PROPER FIT: The elastic waistband provides a snug and great fit that won't restrict her movement. FASHIONABLE DESIGN: This girls' legging set comes in an assortment of trendy colors that every young girl will appreciate in her collection. EASY TO CLEAN: Simply machine wash and tumble dry; Please Reference the Variations for all Available Sizes and Colors. bebe Offers Premium Clothing at Affordable Prices because we value every customer that visits our listings! Stop by Our Storefront to See the Rest of Our Great Deals; we’re confident you’re going to find items that anyone who needs a gift will really appreciate!
